titles.title: To nullify Public Land Order No. 7921, withdrawing certain land in the Railroad Valley of Nye County, Nevada, from mineral entry.
To nullify Public Land Order No. 7921, withdrawing certain land in the Railroad Valley of Nye County, Nevada, from mineral entry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary: This bill nullifies Public Land Order No. 7921, which withdrew public land for National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) satellite calibration in the Railroad Valley of Nye County, Nevada.
